body:
- [ ] write something coherent here

History, undo, treating everything the same (Level format #19, multiplayer &
Distribution #12, editor interactions -> multiplayer editing, networking #54, journal based tests #22).

Compaction esp. to keep local saves small, warn when certain size thresholds are hit. Can I query the save folder quota?

See also: original journal system. Supercharge it.
title: event sourcing
